name: Gyro13 – Freeride HD
description:
***** Freeride features a brand new level which is not included in original Gyro13.

Hints How to control:

• Press the gas button to fly up, release it to descend.
• Use the slider to move forward or backward.
• After landing on a checkpoint landing platform, your copter is instantly repaired miners standing nearby will try to enter it.
• Maneuvering slowly over a miner gone astray will activates your GyroLux (located in the rear area of your copter).
• Touching the display outside the copter controls activates your pulse cannon.
• In order to complete a mission you have to land with at least one miner on the furthest landing platform before time runs out.

***** You Tube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fzdGPqM9Qug

***** Full version - Gyro13 Steam Copter Arcade HD - features 24 levels. http://itunes.apple.com/app/gyro13/id463401185?mt=8

Ready to Fly?

Gyro13 is a full-featured, physics-based helicopter arcade game. It emphasizes balance, skill, and control as you tackle obstacles in cavernous mines. Maneuver your steam copter through the deep dark tunnels of the mines while facing unforgiving time limits for saving miners, tricky machinery and other threats.

The game features stunning full HD graphics and proven old school gameplay.

If you think you can:
- avoid or use the treacherous wind rifts to your advantage
- save all miners
- find ways to operate puzzling machines
- escape even from the most desperate situations
- deal with the lethal poisonous clouds
- master the powerful pulse cannon
- become one with your copter and make it through the hell and back

then download now…
